org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowMessageQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowMessageQueue

  • @Implements(value=android.os.MessageQueue.class)
public class ShadowMessageQueue
extends Object
    Shadow for MessageQueue.

    This class puts Messages into the scheduler queue instead of sending them to be handled on a separate thread. Messages that are scheduled to be dispatched can be triggered by calling ShadowLooper.idleMainLooper().

    See Also:
    ShadowLooper
